name: I am not good with boomerangs
name_original: I am not good with boomerangs
description:
Your boomerang throws are so bad you break the laws of physics and get unexpectedly dangerous returns.

This game was made for the xkcd game jam. It was inspired by this comic: https://xkcd.com/445/

The game is quite unfinished. I may keep working on it after the jam to bring it to a more complete state.
